colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LAS @004A *, ,MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,MI RTAG PA NYID KYI MDO RDZOGS SO,, ,,RGYA GAR GYI MKHAN PO SU RAN DRA BODDHI DANG, ZHU CHEN GYI LO TZTSA BA BAn DE ZHANG YE SHES SDES BSGYUR CING ZHUS NAS SKAD GSANG CHAD KYIS KYANG BSNAN NAS GTAN LA PHAB PO, ,MNYAM MEDo DRIN CAN BCOM LDAN GSUNG BYIN GYIS, , BAG MEDo NYAM CHUNG BYIS PA'I TSOGS RNAMS KUN, ,TSOGS MEDo PAR YANG MI RTAG DON RIG NAS, ,BSLU MEDo GTAN GYI BDE LA 'DUN GYUR CIG ,SMON LAM RNAM PAR DAG PA'O, ,
